events.message: I am filing a claim for my car after it was involved in a collision last night that caused significant damage to the front bumper and headlights.
The claim has been categorised under Auto Accident based on the description of vehicle damage caused by the recent collision.
An insurance agent has been assigned to your auto accident claim and will be your point of contact throughout the process.
We have received your claim and acknowledge the accident involving your vehicle. Our team is reviewing the details submitted.
Please provide photos of the vehicle damage, police report from the collision, and your driver's license to proceed with the investigation.
All requested documents including accident photos and police report have been submitted successfully for your auto accident claim.
Our claims investigation department has begun reviewing evidence and circumstances around the car collision incident.
The investigation into your vehicle accident claim is complete. We have gathered all necessary details to make a settlement decision.
A settlement offer has been proposed based on the vehicle repair estimates and policy coverage for the auto accident claim.
You have provided feedback on the proposed settlement, expressing concerns about certain damage cost estimations.
Based on your feedback, the claim has been escalated to senior management for further review and reassessment.
Your auto accident claim has been approved with the revised settlement amount after re-evaluation.
Settlement payment for your car accident claim has been issued and should arrive in your designated account within 3 business days.
We have closed your auto accident claim as all procedures are complete and the settlement has been successfully processed.
